snippet: Top-ranked Angelique Kerber has confirmed she will start 2017 at the Brisbane International tournament from Jan. 1 as she prepares to defend her Australian Open title....
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Angelique Kerber has confirmed she will start 2017 at the Brisbane International tournament from Jan. 1 as she prepares to defend her Australian Open title.

headline.print_headline: Kerber, Muguruza Confirmed for Brisbane International
headline.main: Kerber, Muguruza Confirmed for Brisbane International
